name: Work Hazard (Siddharth, Joe Sujin, samyurai, wickedcube, GodOfNoobs)
name_original: Work Hazard (Siddharth, Joe Sujin, samyurai, wickedcube, GodOfNoobs)
description:
Trading card game, uses elements and themes from the office life. 

Rules : 

  1. Two Card Types: Attack (Red), Defense (Blue)
  2. Flip cards are used to flip yours or your opponents hand.
  3. Remember the law- Stationeries beat paper, papers beat liquids and liquids beat stationeries.(Rock paper scissor logic)
  4. Use mouse to select cards and flip targets, Esc to pause.
